text: If you're not sure you want to do YC, I'd suggest using the
application as a free service to ask yourself important questions
There are some good time-tested questions in there that can
prompt the conversations that you should probably be having
Questions like, what's new about this?
How much money could we make?
And if you get an interview, that's a different service - having
a conversation about your start up with investors.
The short answer is that you don't need to decide whether
you want to do the program before filling out an application
or even interviewing because they're both helpful on their
own. Plus, they allow you to interact with YC more before
